analysis.key_quote: To introduce a political element would greatly impair their work and the work of the many volunteers who, like me, share their time and interest in the important work being done at SERC.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the introduction of political elements into the work of federal agencies, indicating a belief that this would undermine the integrity and effectiveness of their missions. This aligns with opposition to the proposed rule, which could lead to politicization of civil service positions.
